introduction: Immortal is a series of ten 70-minute TV movie, nakrútených the world and themes of works of Slovak literature, will be transferred to the current environment. Individual parts: 1 - Bracelet - Drama about the motives of jealousy zničujúcej theater games JM Lermontov - Masquerade. Alex, a former gambler with a dubious thing of the past, live your new life alongside wholesome young and beautiful wife. Generosity and tolerance, however, leave at a time when his wife becomes the victim of misunderstanding and machination, beyond which is a lost bracelet. Othelovská jealous ...
